wikipedia_page.main: Charles Robert Rowley (29 December 1849 – 5 April 1933) was an English army officer and first-class cricketer.

response: * Sir Charles Robert Rowley, 4th Baronet (1800–1888), see Rowley baronets
* Sir Charles Robert Rowley, 7th Baronet, 8th Baronet (1926–2008), succeeded as eighth Baronet of Tendring Hall in 1997, see Rowley baronets
